title: The 5 best smart scales of 2022
description: With the right smart scale, you can track your muscle mass, water weight, and BMI to better understand your physical health. ZDNET's expert pick for the best smart scale is the Withings Body+ Scale. It's reliable and accurate. But here's how it compares to some other top-notch bathroom scales, all of which are trusted and worth your money.

title: The 5 best solar lanterns of 2022
description: When you're sleeping in the wilderness, you need a powerful light source. Ditch heavy, toxic batteries for the best innovative solar lanterns. ZDNET's top choice for lighting up your night is Mpowerd's Luci Pro Outdoor 2.0.

title: Big changes ahead for the cloud business model, top CTO predicts
description: VMware CTO Kit Colbert sees a shift from "distributed" to "decentralized" architectures linked to blockchain for validation. This means multiple organizations running applications.

title: The second-biggest school district in the US was hit with ransomware
description: School opened as planned on Tuesday, while LA Unified worked with local law enforcement and a number of federal agencies to respond to the attack.

title: Microsoft to drop its Scheduler meeting-coordination service in September 2023
description: Microsoft is discontinuing its Scheduler service (formerly Calendar.help) in 2023 for those Microsoft 365 customers who have been paying for it.

title: SteelSeries' new Apex 9 keyboards click with typists and gamers
description: Review: The SteelSeries Apex 9 Mini and TKL sport optical switches with dual actuation depths to provide more precise typing when you want it, or lighting quick actuation when you need it.

title: The 6 best live TV streaming services of 2022
description: If you're interested in going cable-free, you may want to switch to a live TV streaming service, which you can cancel at any time. There are even packages out there that let you watch sports and news online. ZDNET chose Sling TV due to its affordability and variety of plan choices. But there's other options if you want to cut the cord once and for all.

title: Meta announces a one-day virtual event called Meta Connect
description: The event will take place on October 11 and will focus on metaverse and AR/VR updates

title: The 5 best kids' smartwatches of 2022
description: If your child is asking for a smartwatch, or perhaps you're thinking of using one to track them while away from home, ZDNET has compared the top smartwatches for little ones based on kid-friendly features, brand reputation, customers' experiences, and more. We chose the Apple Watch SE as the best kids' smartwatch overall, as it features a walkie-talkie, sleep tracker, and GPS.

title: Nitrux 2.4 Linux distro shows promise but seems rough around the edges
description: Jack Wallen kicks the tires of a beautiful, Debian-based systemd-free distro, and comes away with more questions than answers.

title: Razer deal: Orochi V2 wireless gaming mouse is 50% off
description: Get Razer's mobile gaming mouse for $34. It's perfect if you're traveling, thanks to 950 hours of battery life. And that's not a typo.

title: The 10 best phone deals right now: September 2022
description: Whether you're upgrading or buying your very first smartphone, check out these phone deals that include hefty discounts on Samsung, Apple, and Sony devices.

title: The 5 best mechanical keyboards of 2022
description: Mechanical keyboards have become one of the fastest-growing areas of gaming and PC peripherals. They're also a booming hobby. ZDNET chose Keychron K8 Wireless as the best mechanical keyboard -- it's affordable, too! -- but here's how it compares to other starter boards and ready-made solutions available.

title: How to run websites as apps with ease in Linux
description: Jack Wallen shows you how easy it is to run a website as a web app in Linux with any browser.

title: The Charge Comfort 2 e-bike is a smooth ride that fits in tight spaces
description: Review: The Charge Comfort 2 is a large-sized electric bike that's easy to ride and even easier to store.

title: Google will unveil Pixel 7 and Pixel Watch on Oct. 6
description: Google is almost ready to share its latest Made By Google hardware.

title: HyperX Sale: Shop gaming favorites for up to 50% off
description: HyperX has been around for 20 years, and to celebrate, you can score some great deals on top-quality accessories.

title: The 8 best iPhone models of 2022
description: Apple is about to announce new iPhone models -- so now is the time to look at the current lineup, to decide whether you should upgrade or wait until the new phones are here. Currently, Apple's iPhone 13 Pro Max is ZDNET's top choice for the best iPhone model available, as it offers amazing performance and a long battery life. But here's how it compares to other iPhones you can buy.

title: The iPhone mini is dead. Long live the iPhone Plus
description: The latest iPhone rumors tell us which side Apple is on in the small phone versus big phone debate.

title: The PC is struggling again - but the end of Windows 10 will give it a boost
description: Global shipments of traditional PCs will fall 12.8%, while tablets fall 6.8%, according to an IDC forecast.

title: The 5 best fantasy football apps of 2022
description: It's that time of year: The leaves are changing, and football is starting back up. If you want to host your own fantasy football league, ESPN Fantasy is ZDNET's top choice. We compared interfaces, users, timeliness of news, and brand reputation in order to find the best fantasy football apps that give you the most information in a quick glance for your fantasy season.

title: The two smart devices I will never install in my house
description: David Gewirtz really enjoys smart devices, but here are two classes of device for which the risk is just too big to justify the reward. He doesn't need the added convenience that much.

title: How to restore deleted or modified files with the help of OneDrive
description: Looking for a file that's either been deleted or modified with unwanted changes? OneDrive may hold the answer.

title: Chatty AI is going to eat into call centers jobs
description: Conversational AI is coming to the call center in a big way. But it's not easy or cheap to implement and maintain.

title: Buying a new iPhone this week? This is the charger you'll want to buy
description: Apple is expected to ditch the charger again with the upcoming iPhone 14. Anker has a fast, smart, and more sustainable solution.

title: Don't change these five iPhone settings
description: Really, just let your iPhone do its thing.

title: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 3, hands on: Comfortable and great-sounding earbuds
description: The Momentum True Wireless 3 earbuds deliver excellent sound quality, lots of personalisation options via the companion app, and plenty of battery life.

title: Artemis launch plan: Here are NASA's next steps
description: NASA expects it will take "several weeks" to fix technical issues behind the hydrogen leak in its Space Launch System's core stage fuel tanks.

title: Why I finally ditched the cable company and chose YouTube TV
description: When you're choosing a live TV streaming service, it's important to look beyond the monthly price tag. Channel lineups and overall user experience were enough to tip the scales for me.

title: This overlooked cybersecurity risk could create an ocean of trouble for us all
description: Global supply chains rely on the smooth running of shipping and ports, but maritime cybersecurity is too often a low priority.

title: The new Apple Watch Pro could bring a major shift in design
description: The Apple Watch Pro features a new button on the left side and a radical redesign that likely won't appeal to most consumers, according to leaked CAD renders.

title: How avatars and machine learning are helping this company to fast track digital transformation
description: By developing in-house talent and working with pioneering startups, LNER is moving towards its digital destination – and its experiences provide lessons for all businesses.

title: Philips Hue smart lighting starter kit is on sale for only $84
description: You can save $30 on the typical retail price of the Hue starter kit.
